categories: Category:Years in the Great Peace of the Republic era

nodes.text: The following events took place in 157 BBY.

The sourcebook Galaxy Guide 7: Mos Eisley states that the Wookiee Chalmun is 157 years old. Galaxy Guide 7 describes the current state of Mos Eisley as it exists circa 0 ABY, shortly after the events of Star Wars: Episode IV A New Hope. Although this year is not stated outright in the source material, simple mathematics arrives at a birth date of 157 BBY for Chalmun.
